dynamideForm.htmlsrc: <html> <body> <form name="frmSaveContents" METHOD="post" ACTION="/dynamide/ide"> <textarea name="htmlSource">NADA</textarea> <input type="hidden" name="SESSIONID" value="$SESSIONID"/> <input type="hidden" name="next" value="inspectorhidden"/> <input type="hidden" name="page" value="inspectorhidden"/> <input type="hidden" name="targetPageID" value=""/> <input type="hidden" name="action" value="inspectorHiddenAction"/> </form> </body> </html>
